pages.text: Vault Potions can be modified to contain $(l)modifiers$().$(br2)The $(l)higher$() the $(l)tier$() of the Vault Potion, the more modifiers slots it contains.$(br2)The number of slots are:$(br)$(li)0: $(l)Vial$()$(li)1: $(l)Potion$()$(li)2: $(l)Mixture$()$(li)3: $(l)Brew$()

pages.title: Alchemy Table
pages.text: In the Alchemy Table, the preferred modifiers can be $(l)crafted$() onto the Vault Potion at the cost of $(l)Vault Gold$() and $(l)Poisonous Mushrooms$().$(br2)Upon $(l)consuming$() the Vault Potion, the modifier(s) are applied for $(l)20 seconds$().

pages.title: Alchemy Archive
pages.text: $(l)Not$() all available modifiers can be crafted onto a Vault Potion.$(br2)Some modifiers are gated behind the player's $(l)level$().$(br2)Others can be taught to the player by finding an $(l)Alchemy Archive$() inside a $(l:the_vault/layout#dungeons)$(t:Dungeons)dungeon$() in any Vault.
